update userinfo
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_nickName = #{userNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
id_card = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_head = #{userHead,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.select:
select
from userinfo where user_name like CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%') and user_status = 2
mapper.update: update userinfo set password = #{newPassword} where 1 = 1 and user_name = #{userName} and password = #{password}
mapper.select:
select
from userinfo where is_delete = '2' and concat(user_name,user_nickName,id_card,mobile) LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{loginUser},'%')
